title:
Integrable hierarchy for homogeneous realization of toroidal Lie algebra
  $\mathcal{L}^{\rm tor}_{r+1}(\mathfrak{sl}_\ell)$
abstract:
Starting from a fairly explicit homogeneous realization of the toroidal Lie
algebra $\mathcal{L}^{\rm tor}_{r+1}(\mathfrak{sl}_\ell)$ via lattice vertex
algebra, we derive an integrable hierarchy of Hirota bilinear equations.
Moreover, we represent this hierarchy in the form of Lax equations, and show
that it is an extension of a certain reduction of the $\ell$-component KP
hierarchy.
subjects: Nonlinear Sciences/Exactly Solvable and Integrable Systems
